divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home, see who was at the building and noticed the lights,didn't know what it was, it hoovered a couple of minutes, then disappeared. I was amazed and got my phone out and took two pictures and texted my mom to get outside and look south. I drove home to get my parents to see if they could see it. They didn't.
Summary: Driving home from gym saw it hoovering over building
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sandy Valley
This sighting has never been favorited.
